message.body: Haha now that you're following me on Instagram you'll see how totally lame my feed is
I mainly post selfies and stupid poorly composition ally organized shots
I have a seriously lame Instagram account and I have to fight the urge to post dog pics
Tell me if you're ever in Philly though!! Pls visit me
Lol I mean most of my camera roll is blurry pictures of dog butts that I see on the street
So I feel that
How are you?
(And what are you doing in ny)

Awesome! I moved to west Philly, have a bunch of painting shows lined up, and I'm meeting w a guy wed about opening my Own gallery but shhh don't tell anyone bc I work pt at a gallery now and don't want boss to know
If it works out, I'll totally hire you for freelance stuff!!
Omg that's awesome about your gallery and shows!
It's super exciting / I have an interview with Jamillah James too!!!
But I'm behind on it
(Email interview she agreed to do and have my publish yada yada)
How's ny?!
Hehe id love to pop in for a guest appearance
Hell yes. My entire focus is on creating my own business so that I can hire all my friends and never have to deal w people i dislike ever again
New York is great! Have a great apartment with my friend Rachel. Dating a guy for like 7 months and we met on tinder. Working at that website meetup.com which is great
Oh I remember that guy!!
Thinking that if I go back to school it prob won't be for art history. Leaning towards American studies now
(From your tinder story not from real life obv)
Meetup.com ooooh
Didn't know you did that, that's so cool!
Yeah it's great! Really great benefits and an awesome work environment
Loll
Are you ever in ny? I haven't been to Philly since moving which is weird
A friend of mine did her undergrad in American studies at brown and now works as a designer at urban outfitters (I don't get it either!)
It's not weird at all
Doing the Philly New York thing is stressful but I actually AM in New York a bunch to visit Jill and I went to Sophia Narrett's show at nancy Margolis gallery which was cool
I'll def text you next time I'm up there! Can't wait!
Oh awesome! Yes please dooo
